conversation.message_text: CLEARSTEM: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from CLEARSTEM.
CLEARSTEM: Welcome to CLEARSTEM! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel. Privacy: attnl.tv/p/T4W
CLEARSTEM: Welcome! Click here for your offer: clearstem.attn.tv/aIBgxxMmcdPk .

CLEARSTEM: Oh, also, a lot of people like getting personal recs from us. Over the next few days we'll try to help you find something that you will love.

To start, take our 60-second quiz to help us create the perfect skincare routine for you > https://clearstem.attn.tv/a_KrbMYS9PUz .
Is this good for clear mature skin?
CLEARSTEM: For mature skin, BOUNCEBACK is ideal. It's an anti-aging powerhouse that targets wrinkles and scar damage. More info: https://clearstem.attn.tv/aPC_DmGOivIu
Thank you!

CLEARSTEM: Roses are red, violets are blue, we're giving away a free Mini HYDRAGLOW just for YOU. 

To claim your Galentine's gift, spend $75, add your mini to cart, and use code LOVE: clearstem.attn.tv/aKQOiA0Z3f8k .
I just plac3d an order today.  Can you please add it with code LOVE?  Order #CS1199152
CLEARSTEM: Thanks for your order! I can check with my team to see if we can apply the code to your order. Could you please also confirm the email address it's under so we can proceed?
Asklein52@gmail.com
This was my first order

CLEARSTEM: Thank you for the details! I can see that the discount code BECLEAR15 for $15 is already applied to your order, and we are unable to apply two codes to the same order.

Could you please let me know if you would like to keep the BECLEAR15 code, or remove it and apply the code LOVE to receive a free Mini HYDRAGLOW instead?
Keep the first one.  Thx
Hey. Better yet.  Please cancel that order?  I ll just reorder again.   Thx
CLEARSTEM: I understand. Let me check on this with my team, and I'll get back to you as soon as I have more information. I'll keep you updated!
It hasn't been shipped yet, so shouldn't t be a problem.
CLEARSTEM: Thank you for letting me know! I have passed this on to my team and I will get back as soon as I hear from them! Hang tight!

promo_and_promo_exclusions: MINDBODYSKIN is not eligible for any discount codes!
Codes only apply to products found here: https://clearstem.com/collections/all-items-codes-allowed?srsltid=AfmBOor8cOzvFvRGC60_ZKpExyRCdNOowQ8eGgZyJyAn341uscwJDfsZ

Sebastian Cruz Couture: Hey Alkendric, this is Jordan . I noticed you were interested in something https://sebastiancruzcouture.attn.tv/aRhxfGool_QV .

Anything I can help you with? Text me anytime Reply STOP to stop
Yes I love this suit but it's a little out of my budget

Sebastian Cruz Couture: Thank you for your feedback. Check out The Vault collection for affordable options: https://sebastiancruzcouture.attn.tv/aDerwzKpKzdr. If you have questions, feel free to reach out!
Ok well help me out me a cream tuxedo together I'm getting married June 13 2026

Sebastian Cruz Couture: Congratulations on your upcoming wedding! For a cream tuxedo, consider the Cream Maglia Silk Luxury Necktie: https://sebastiancruzcouture.attn.tv/ahNUdpjXpMl_. Let me know if you need more options!
This jacket but the size I need is probably a 34r

Sebastian Cruz Couture: Thanks for sending that screenshot over! it appears that specific jacket is not available in 34R. What do you think about these instead?

https://sebastiancruzcouture.attn.tv/amzIgJBLkSJg
https://sebastiancruzcouture.attn.tv/aIzH_GJ0BJY8

Let me know how that goes.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for order status updates
Send to CS if there's a pending ESC and cx ask for an update (even if it's been less than 2 business days)
escalate: ESC immediately if the customer wants an order to arrive at a specific time, or before our standard shipping time
ESC for product info that you can't find on the site
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
templates: If cx sends us their measurements or asks about making a custom sizing order use the CUS template.
If cx mentions that they're going to lose weight, use 'Lose weight' template.
dos_and_don_ts: Do not recommend the customer go to a place to get measured
"@ The Vault" items are designated for returns/exchanges, but may also be available in other sizes on The Vault website. Always check there first
When the color is closer to white and not cream we say off white
You should never direct the customer to the sizing chart when they mention custom sizing or they send their measurements
Don't tell the customer to hold off on purchase if they are going to lose weight.
drive_to_purchase: When recommending products, make sure they're aligned with the colors, style the cx is looking for
promo_and_promo_exclusions: If cx ask about pricing, tell them to add items to their cart and the best discount will apply automatically
The 40% discount applies automatically when cx add five or more items to their cart
If cx going to purchase a lot of products in one purchase, share with them what you can find on current offer page along with the link: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/current-offers
